name: AN_HSB_LINK_PROCS
description: For use with anesthesia, stores all patient encounters (procedure cases, appointments) that are linked to by (fall under the sedation of) the anesthesia episode.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the Episode.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EPT_PROC_CSN
columns.description: Provides the patient encounter contact serial numbers (CSNs) for procedures linked to the anesthesia episode.
